Test Name: Chlamydia trachomatis, Nucleic Acid Amplification Test (NAAT)
Specimen Type: Patient specimens for Chlamydia testing (specific type not stated in SOP)
Purpose: To detect Chlamydia trachomatis nucleic acid with high accuracy and reliability for diagnostic reporting.
Equipment: Nucleic acid extraction system, thermal cycler/real-time PCR instrument, pipettes with filter tips, vortex mixer, centrifuge, biosafety cabinet
